name: Vivekananda Innovations for Developing Youth Ambitions Foundations (Vidya Foundations)
briefDescription: VIDYA Foundations has been striving to uplift the downtrodden and underprivileged rural and tribal communities of Srikakulam District. we have formed 61 Self Help Groups and initiated so many skill development trainings to the SHG members and we provided our services to establish rural industries. till now there are 360 women beneficiaries among them 32 have established Chalk Piece Making Industry and they are supplying to Tribal Welfare Schools of ITDA, Seethampeta and they prevented their poverty themselves.
